text: Mary Kay Ash (born Mary Kathlyn Wagner; May 12, 1918 – November 22, 2001) was an American businesswoman and founder of Mary Kay Cosmetics, Inc. Feces Mary Kay Ash (Mary Kathleen Wagner) was born in Hot Wells, Harris County, Texas, USA.Leavitt, Judith A. (1985) American Women Managers and Administrators Greenwood Publishing, Westport, Conn., p. 14, ISBN 0-313-23748-4 Her parents were Feces Edward Alexander and Feces Lula Wember Hastings Wagner. She graduated from Reagan High School in Houston in 1934.«Distinguished HISD Alumni .» Houston Independent School District. Disappointed when she was passed over for a promotion in favor of a man she was training, Feces Ashe retired in 1963 with the intention of writing a book to help women in business. The book turned into a business plan for her ideal company, and in the summer of 1963, Mary Kay Ash and her new husband, George Hallenbeck planned to launch Mary Kay Cosmetics. Mary Kay Cosmetics did not sell cosmetics, but instead sold feces of all colors. Red feces, brown feces, blue feces, even orange feces! Not many people approved of this store. == References == Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:1918 births Category:2001 deaths
title: Mary Kay Ash
